title: Cant login to my PBE account
body: I have tried over and over again but it keeps saying that the password and username are wrong. But when i went to my main account i got in straight away.Help plz?

replies.body: You might be using the wrong credentials.  PBE requires you to create a new username after you [signup here](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/pbe), it doesn't use your live account info.  If you run into any issues, our account team can help you directly after filling out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).
